price: 35. “Er is niets anders dan onze eerste dood en wij zullen niet herrijzen.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
